name.ja: <ruby>ＢＫ<rt>バーニングナックラー</rt></ruby> チーフセコンド

text.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack and you control a FIRE and/or Warrior monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, negate the attack, then banish 1 monster on the field until the End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Battlin' Boxer Chief Second" once per turn. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Battlin' Boxer" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
